java/liquibase/DatabaseChangeLogLock.java

00001 package liquibase;
00002 
00003 import java.util.Date;
00004 
00009 public class DatabaseChangeLogLock {
00010     private final int id;
00011     private final Date lockGranted;
00012     private final String lockedBy;
00013 
00014     public DatabaseChangeLogLock(int id, Date lockGranted, String lockedBy) {
00015         this.id = id;
00016         this.lockGranted = new Date(lockGranted.getTime());
00017         this.lockedBy = lockedBy;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public int getId() {
00021         return id;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public Date getLockGranted() {
00025         return (Date) lockGranted.clone();
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getLockedBy() {
00029         return lockedBy;
00030     }
00031 }
